title: Writing Calligraphy
marks:
Inscription and Marks

URC, in Japanese
description: calligrapher and assistant kneeling in profile over long sheet of paper with light grey markings; calligrapher, at R wearing white robe, kneels on round mat over a long sheet of paper; hair pulled back, long beard, holds brown calligraphy brush in PR hand; across the long sheet, which rests on a grey mat with concentric decoration; assistant wearing black coat squats, steadying paper; short, two character inscription R edge
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
